notifications.tax-collector: A tax collector is being attacked!

alert.text-1: You currently benefit from the {{status}} counterpart, until {{date}}
alert.text-2: If you have any questions do not hesitate to go on our

main.explanation: Only Tipeur (donors) have the right to access to the VIP features, to make a donation go on our

inactivity.title: Extension of idle time before disconnection (Wabbit or +)

estimator.title: Estimator of spell damage in battle (Wabbit or +)

health-bar.title: Displaying the life bars below the fighters (Grand Pa Wabbit or +)

authentication.explanation: To benefit from the VIP options you must enter your code in the field below :

general.disable-inactivity: Extended deadline for disconnection for inactivity
general.health-bar: Activate the display of the life bars below the fighters
general.estimator: Enable Estimating Spell Damage in battle

auto-group.warning: /!\ Care, the auto-group can be considered as a bot by other players, use it in moderation and in unpopulated areas
auto-group.explanation-1: The characters in the group must be friends with the leader so that the invitation is automatic
auto-group.explanation-2: The members of the group follow the leader only if the latter is on the same map
auto-group.members: Names of characters (exactname) in the group (separated by a semicolon)
auto-group.follow-leader: Follow the leader (the members follow the leader)
auto-group.random-move: Move on adjacent squares (when following the leader)

shortcuts.title: Shortcuts
shortcuts.description1: You can use special keys: ctrl, shift, space, alt (ctrl = cmd on Macintosh OS X)
shortcuts.description2: You can specify your shortcut by pressing the desired keys at the same time after selecting the input

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: You can receive notifications from the game when the application is on the background. You will be notified:
notifications.tax-collector: When a tax collector is attacked

information.error: Can't download the update! Please try again later
